details.desc: I have since been added AngularJS but this is one of the first projects of mine at The Iron Yard. The project displays commit messages by iterating over the GitHub API from my profile. The project demonstrates mobile-first, responsive design. It is a moch of a tympanum code drop and uses ng-repeat for each commit message from the json file.

I decided to showcase inspirational quotes from Eleanor Roosevelt that inspire me to be bolder in my endeavors. This is a project that loops through an array of quotes from Eleanor Roosevelt. This project was given mid-way through the cohort and demonstrates responsive design. The quotes carousel is set on a timer and the background images altnerate on another timer and uses jQuery.

This is the final project I completed for The Iron Yard. This project was thought up as a way to not only allow users a way to take a quick break in their work day but to offer them an opportunity to schedule a private lesson with me, a certified yoga instructor.
